activities:
As a service provider, Irdeto only processes personal information on behalf of our customers. Databases containing personal information are copied in encrypted form between our data centers within the EU/EEA and the U.S. for backup and disaster recovery purposes.

In addition, technical support staff in the U.S. may view personal information in the EU data center in the process of providing support to our customers and their consumers.
contacttitle1: Associate General Counsel, Americas and Global IP
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer and client data, collected by electronic information systems such as web sites. No manually processed data is involved.
